tags.name: rc-icon
tags.description: Loads an icon asynchronously, caching the result for future uses

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the icon, this is relative to the assets folder of the system

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: The full path of the icon, this will only be used if `name` isn't provided or fails to fetch.

attributes.name: var:size
attributes.description: The size of the icon, must be a valid CSS unit

attributes.name: var:fill
attributes.description: The fill of the icon, must be a valid CSS colour

attributes.name: var:stroke
attributes.description: The stroke colour of the icon, must be a valid CSS colour

attributes.name: var:stroke-width
attributes.description: The stroke width of the icon, must be a valid CSS unit

attributes.name: var:stroke-linejoin
attributes.description: The stroke linejoin of the icon, must be a valid CSS value
